content: repeat from * to end 8sts decrease 104 112 120 sts round 2 *k1 k1 p1 to last 3sts before m k2 p1 sm repeat from * to end round 3 *ssk p1 k1 to last 4sts before m p1 k2tog p1 sm repeat from * to end 8sts decrease 96 104 112 sts round 4 *k1 p1 repeat from * to end slipping m along the way repeat rounds 1-4 two three three more times 64 56 64 sts then repeat rounds 1-2 one zero one more time 56 56 56 sts round 5 *ssk k1 p1 x 4 k1 k2tog p1 sm repeat from * to end 48sts round 6 *ssk p1 k1 x 3 p1 k2tog p1 sm repeat from * to end 40sts round 7 *ssk k1 p1 x 2 k1 k2tog p1 sm repeat from * to end 32sts round 8 *ssk p1 k1 p1 k2tog p1 sm repeat from * to end 24sts round 9 *ssk k1 k2tog p1 sm repeat from * to end 16sts round 10 *cdd p1 remove m repeat from * to end 8sts finishing directions cut yarn thread yarn through live sts and pull tight weave in ends and gently block to dimensions wear and enjoy images text and pattern © norichan knits 2025 this pattern is for personal use only questions or comments email hello@norichanknits com ravelry norichan instagram @norichanknits 4
